definition: Joseph Goebbels (1897-1945), German Nazi leader and politician
dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: I went to arrest Goebbels, taking a Leutnant and a squad of men with me.
sentences.chinese: 我帶着少尉和一小隊人去逮捕戈培爾。
